recipesJson.name: Ronnie Lott's Missing Pinky (Raspberry Milk Tart)
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
Ronnie Lott had his pinkie amputated so he could continue playing in a foot ball game, tell me how hardcore modern day players are?

Sweeten to taste.
